usage.user_limit_reached_description: You've reached your user limit. Contact support to add more users.
usage.user_capacity_description: Manage your organization's user capacity and monitor available slots.
usage.critical_balance_warning: Critical: AI credits running low. Consider upgrading your plan.
usage.low_balance_warning: Warning: AI credits are getting low.

tier.user_limit_exceeded: Cannot create user: organization has reached the maximum number of users ({{max}}) for the {{tier}} tier.
tier.ai_credits_insufficient: Insufficient AI credits to complete this request. Credits needed: {{required}}, available: {{available}}.
tier.feature_not_available: This feature is not available in your current tier ({{tier}}). Please upgrade to access this functionality.
